alert.note: Alert for Canyonlands, Natural Bridges; La Sal and Abajo Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 7:16PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central San Juan County through 745 PM MDT... At 715 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles southeast of Canyonlands National Park, or 25 miles west of La Sal, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. Brief, heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar and satellite estimates. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central San Juan County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Canyonlands, Natural Bridges; La Sal and Abajo Mountains
